thread.title: Putin's nuke plan shows broken bromance with Trump

title: Putin's nuke plan shows broken bromance with Trump
text:
Putin's nuke plan shows broken bromance with Trump 6:47am GMT - 02:21 
Russian President Vladimir Putin went out of his way this week to portray a stepped-up nuclear weapons system targeting the U.S., the latest sign Trump's effort to cultivate a warmer relationship with the Russian leader is not bearing fruit. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russian President Vladimir Putin went out of his way this week to portray a stepped-up nuclear weapons system targeting the U.S., the latest sign Trump's effort to cultivate a warmer relationship with the Russian leader is not bearing fruit.
